metadata.dc:title: Mielodisplasia con deleción del cromosoma 7 asociada a tuberculosis y hepatitis C: un modelo de sinergismo inmunodepresor?
[Myelodysplasia with chromosome 7 deletion associated to tuberculosis and hepatitis C: a pattern of immunodepression synergism?].
